app_description:
I-App yoMgaqo-siseko iphuhliswe yi IYunithi yoLawulo lweDemokhrasi namaLungelo iFakhalthi yoMthetho, iDyunivesithi yaseKapa ngokubambisana no AfricanLII and Laws.Africa , ngekxaso-mali evela kwi Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung . Injongo yale projekthi kukuxhobisa amalungu epalamente aseMzantsi Afrika ngolwazi oluchanekileyo nolugunyazisiweyo ngoMzantsi Afrika umthetho womgaqo-siseko.

Kwesi sicelo, uya kufumana inguqulelo ehlaziyiweyo yaseMzantsi Umgaqo-siseko waseAfrika, kunye nenkcazo ngamagatya awo angundoqo kunye nokutolikwa kwazo kwezona nkundla ziphakamileyo zoMzantsi Afrika. Usetyenziso ikuvumela ukuba ukhangele kwaye ufunde izishwankathelo kunye nezipheleleyo isicatshulwa sezigwebo zenkundla yomgaqo-siseko. Umxholo wale nto isicelo siyafumaneka ngaphandle kwe-intanethi kwaye iya kuhlaziywa kabini ngonyaka.
